name: 1 ¼ lb. extra lean sirloin
instructions: 2 Cans (16 oz. each) of whole tomatoes
Shred Cracker Barrel white sharp 10 oz. (according to taste)
Boil 1 lb. package of Mueller’s elbows
In a 2 quart casserole cut up tomatoes
Add cooked meat and cooked pasta, shredded cheese
